description: Manages a Route within a Route Table.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AddressPrefix.description: The destination CIDR to which the route applies, such as `10.1.0.0/16`.

Name.description: The name of the route. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

NextHopInIpAddress.description: Contains the IP address packets should be forwarded to. Next hop values are only allowed in routes where the next hop type is `VirtualAppliance`.

NextHopType.description: The type of Azure hop the packet should be sent to. Possible values are `VirtualNetworkGateway`, `VnetLocal`, `Internet`, `VirtualAppliance` and `None`.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the route. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

RouteTableName.description: The name of the route table within which create the route. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
